entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a wise and powerful wizard who ignores Uncle Vernon's muttering.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is introduced as someone who is dismissive of Dumbledore's words.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as a returned wizard and the one who has attempted to kill Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as someone who was left on the Dursleys' doorstep by Dumbledore.

entities.name: the dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are mentioned as a family that has neglected and often been cruel to Harry.

relationships.description: Dumbledore left Harry on the doorstep of the Dursleys' house.
Lord Voldemort has attempted to kill Harry multiple times.
Dumbledore asked the Dursleys to care for Harry as their own son.
